description: The Shivering Deer is a medium-sized, ethereal creature often found in cold, misty forests. Its coat shimmers with a faint blue hue, giving it an almost ghostly appearance. Despite its fragile appearance, it possesses an aura of cold that chills the air around it.

traits.name: Aura of Chill
traits.description: Creatures that start their turn within 10 feet of the Shivering Deer must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 1d6 cold damage.

actions.name: Hoof Attack
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8+3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frost Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.description: The Shivering Deer exhales a blast of freezing air in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 (3d6) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
